title: Best Sermons
additional-notes: The original series appears to have run from 1924 to 1927, and a second series started in 1944.  Renewal noted here were typically recorded under Books rather than under Periodicals.

While we have found no renewal mentioning this serial under Contributions to Periodicals, it is possible that sermons included in this series may have been copyrighted in an earlier publication, including publications registered and renewed under Drama (which includes works prepared for oral delivery).  We have not checked for prior publications, or for renewals under Drama, past the 1926 volume.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
